subject: Basketball (College)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Behind 21 points from Brook Lopez and 20 from Deron Williams, the Nets beat the Suns for their third win in the first four games of an eight-game trip.
snippet: Behind 21 points from Brook Lopez and 20 from Deron Williams, the Nets beat the Suns for their third win in the first four games of an eight-game trip.
